Names of Elohim.quote: These are the generations of the heavens and of the earth when they were created, in the day that YHWH Elohim made the earth and the heavens. (Genesis 2:4)

Divine Creation.quote: In the beginning Elohim created the heavens and the earth. (Genesis 1:1)

Divine Justice.quote: For Elohim will bring every deed into judgment, including every hidden thing, whether it is good or evil. (Ecclesiastes 12:14)

Divine Power.quote: Who is like You, Elohim, among the mighty? Who is like You, majestic in holiness? (Exodus 15:11)

Divine Wisdom.quote: For YHWH gives wisdom; from His mouth come knowledge and understanding. (Proverbs 2:6)

Divine Unity.quote: Hear, O Israel: YHWH our Elohim, YHWH is One. (Deuteronomy 6:4)

Divine Law.quote: The law of Elohim is perfect, refreshing the soul. (Psalm 19:7)

Divine Presence.quote: Where can I go from Your Spirit? Where can I flee from Your presence? (Psalm 139:7)

Divine Providence.quote: The eyes of YHWH are everywhere, keeping watch on the wicked and the good. (Proverbs 15:3)

Divine Judgment.quote: Elohim is a righteous judge, and a God who feels indignation every day. (Psalm 7:11)

Divine Mercy.quote: But You, O Lord, are a God merciful and gracious, slow to anger and abounding in steadfast love and faithfulness. (Psalm 86:15)

Divine Truth.quote: The sum of Your word is truth, and every one of Your righteous rules endures forever. (Psalm 119:160)

Divine Holiness.quote: Who is able to stand before YHWH, this holy Elohim? (1 Samuel 6:20)

Divine Sovereignty.quote: Yours, O YHWH, is the greatness and the power and the glory and the victory and the majesty. (1 Chronicles 29:11)

Divine Protection.quote: The name of YHWH is a strong tower; the righteous run into it and are safe. (Proverbs 18:10)

Divine Knowledge.quote: Great is our Lord, and abundant in power; His understanding is beyond measure. (Psalm 147:5)

Divine Covenant.quote: I will establish My covenant between Me and you and your offspring after you throughout their generations. (Genesis 17:7)

Divine Voice.quote: The voice of YHWH is powerful; the voice of YHWH is full of majesty. (Psalm 29:4)

Divine Glory.quote: The heavens declare the glory of El; the skies proclaim the work of His hands. (Psalm 19:1)

Divine Eternity.quote: Before the mountains were brought forth, or ever You had formed the earth and the world, from everlasting to everlasting You are El. (Psalm 90:2)

Divine Authority.quote: For YHWH is the great El, the great King above all gods. (Psalm 95:3)

Divine Attributes.quote: YHWH, YHWH, a God merciful and gracious, slow to anger, and abounding in steadfast love and faithfulness. (Exodus 34:6)

Divine Names.quote: I appeared to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob, as El Shaddai. (Exodus 6:3)

Divine Righteousness.quote: Righteous are You, O YHWH, and right are Your rules. (Psalm 119:137)

Divine Will.quote: Our Elohim is in the heavens; He does all that He pleases. (Psalm 115:3)

Divine Blessing.quote: May Elohim be gracious to us and bless us and make His face to shine upon us. (Psalm 67:1)

Divine Peace.quote: YHWH will bless His people with peace. (Psalm 29:11)

Divine Commandments.quote: And Elohim spoke all these words, saying... (Exodus 20:1)

Divine Redemption.quote: I am YHWH your Elohim, who brought you out of the land of Egypt, out of the house of slavery. (Exodus 20:2)

Divine Guidance.quote: Your word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path. (Psalm 119:105)
